GlobalChangeSpec.Name: Update Plan Stage Global Change
GlobalChangeSpec.Author: HEIFERNET\khamling
GlobalChangeSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_GLOBALCHANGE_UPDATEPLANSTAGE ( @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @ASOF as datetime = null, @NUMBERADDED int = 0 output, @NUMBEREDITED int = 0 output, @NUMBERDELETED int = 0 output, @COMMENT varchar(255), @PROSPECTPLANSTATUSCODEID uniqueidentifier, @PROSPECTPLANSELECTIONID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ) as set nocount off;
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate(); set @NUMBERADDED = 0; set @NUMBEREDITED = 0; set @NUMBERDELETED = 0;
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output;
DECLARE @ADDEDBYID varchar(50) SET @ADDEDBYID = @changeagentid
begin try -- do the global change operation here, and set @NUMBERADDED, @NUMBEREDITED, and/or @NUMBERDELETED as appropriate
DECLARE @PROSPECTPLANSELECTION TABLE ( id UNIQUEIDENTIFIER PRIMARY KEY);
INSERT INTO @PROSPECTPLANSELECTION SELECT id FROM dbo.Ufn_idsetreader_getresults_guid(@PROSPECTPLANSELECTIONID)
declare @T table ( PK int identity(1,1), PROSPECTPLANID uniqueidentifier )
declare @I int = 1 declare @I_MAX int = 1
declare @ID uniqueidentifier declare @LOCATIONID uniqueidentifier = null declare @OTHERLOCATION nvarchar(300) = '' declare @LOCATION nvarchar(300) = ''
insert into @T select ID from @PROSPECTPLANSELECTION
declare @PROSPECTPLANID uniqueidentifier
declare @EXPECTEDDATE datetime = [dbo].[UFN_DATE_GETEARLIESTTIME](getdate()) declare @ACTUALDATE datetime = [dbo].[UFN_DATE_GETEARLIESTTIME](getdate()) declare @OBJECTIVE nvarchar(100) = 'Stage Change' declare @STATUSCODE tinyint = 2 declare @OWNERID uniqueidentifier declare @INTERACTIONTYPECODEID uniqueidentifier declare @ADDITIONALFUNDRAISERS xml = null declare @PARTICIPANTS xml = null declare @INTERACTIONCATEGORYID uniqueidentifier declare @INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID uniqueidentifier declare @EXPECTEDSTARTTIME dbo.UDT_HOURMINUTE = '' declare @EXPECTEDENDTIME dbo.UDT_HOURMINUTE = '' declare @TIMEZONEENTRYID uniqueidentifier = null declare @ISALLDAYEVENT bit = 1 declare @ACTUALSTARTTIME dbo.UDT_HOURMINUTE = '' declare @ACTUALENDTIME dbo.UDT_HOURMINUTE = ''
select @I_MAX = count(*) from @T
--BEGIN LOOPING THROUGH TABLE DEFINED ABOVE while @I <= @I_MAX begin select @PROSPECTPLANID = PROSPECTPLANID from @T where PK = @I
select @OWNERID = PP.PRIMARYMANAGERFUNDRAISERID from dbo.PROSPECTPLAN PP where PP.ID = @PROSPECTPLANID
select top 1 @INTERACTIONTYPECODEID = id from interactiontypecode where description = 'Other';
--select top 1 @INTERACTIONCATEGORYID = id from interactioncategory where name = 'Major Giving Contact'; select top 1 @INTERACTIONCATEGORYID = id from interactioncategory where name = (select value from attributeC59ECF2148B143CA98CE1C880CB4633A where id=@OWNERID)
select top 1 @INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID = id from interactionsubcategory where interactioncategoryid = @INTERACTIONCATEGORYID and name='Stage Change'
set @ID = newid() set @LOCATIONID = null set @OTHERLOCATION = '' set @LOCATION = dbo.UFN_INTERACTION_GETSINGLELINELOCATION(@LOCATIONID, @OTHERLOCATION);
exec dbo.USP_STEP_ADD @ID output, @CHANGEAGENTID, @PROSPECTPLANID, @EXPECTEDDATE, @ACTUALDATE, @STATUSCODE, @OWNERID, @INTERACTIONTYPECODEID, @OBJECTIVE, @PROSPECTPLANSTATUSCODEID, @COMMENT, @ADDITIONALFUNDRAISERS, @PARTICIPANTS, @INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID, @EXPECTEDSTARTTIME, @EXPECTEDENDTIME, @TIMEZONEENTRYID, @ISALLDAYEVENT, @ACTUALSTARTTIME, @ACTUALENDTIME,@LOCATION;
set @NUMBEREDITED=@NUMBEREDITED + 1
set @I = @I + 1 -- end --END LOOPING THROUGH TABLE DEFINED ABOVE
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR; return 1; end catch
